title: Remove a collaborator
name: DeleteCollaborator
description: Removes user with provided id from collaborators list. Can be used either by house owner or one of its collaborators in order to remove oneself from collaborating.
groupDescription: Endpoints for managing information about user's houses called houses. Every house has one owner that can change house info and add other users as collaborators.

title: Delete a house
name: DeleteHouse
groupDescription: Endpoints for managing information about user's houses called houses. Every house has one owner that can change house info and add other users as collaborators.

title: Get all accessible storage
description: Return array of storage items from all rooms of all houses accesible by a user
name: GetAllStorage
groupDescription: Endpoints for managing information about user's houses called houses. Every house has one owner that can change house info and add other users as collaborators.

title: Get the list of collaborators
name: GetCollaboratorList
groupDescription: Endpoints for managing information about user's houses called houses. Every house has one owner that can change house info and add other users as collaborators.

title: Get house info
name: GetHouseInfo
description: Return an object containing house information as well as array of rooms that belong to the requested house. Each room contains an array of it's storage items.

groupDescription: Endpoints for managing information about user's houses called houses. Every house has one owner that can change house info and add other users as collaborators.

title: Get the list of houses
name: GetHouseList
description: Return an array of houses that user owns and is a collaborator in.

groupDescription: Endpoints for managing information about user's houses called houses. Every house has one owner that can change house info and add other users as collaborators.

title: Add a collaborator
name: PostAddCollaborator
description: Adds a user as a collaborator. First user with matching login or email is added.
groupDescription: Endpoints for managing information about user's houses called houses. Every house has one owner that can change house info and add other users as collaborators.

title: Create new house
name: PostHouse
groupDescription: Endpoints for managing information about user's houses called houses. Every house has one owner that can change house info and add other users as collaborators.

title: Create a room
name: PostRoom
description: Creates a room in a house with provided id

name: PutHouseInfo

title: Delete item
name: DeleteItem
groupDescription: This controller controls user's items as well as publicly available items. Each user adds items to their database that can be added later as a storage items within rooms.

title: Get item info
name: GetItem

permission.name: item's owner or logged in user

title: Delete a room
name: DeleteRoom
groupDescription: Controller for managing rooms within houses. Each room has it's own items. Item can be added, modified and deleted within the room. A room can be created, modified or deleted by the house owner.

title: Delete an item from a room's storage
name: DeleteStorageItem
groupDescription: Controller for managing rooms within houses. Each room has it's own items. Item can be added, modified and deleted within the room. A room can be created, modified or deleted by the house owner.
